repositories.author: Meowv
repositories.name: Blog
repositories.description: 此版本个人博客项目底层基于 ABP Framework(不完全依赖)搭建项目 和免费开源跨平台的 .NET Core 3.1 开发，可作为 .NET Core 入门项目进行学习，支持各种主流数据库(SqlServer、MySQL、PostgreSql、Sqlite)，接口遵循 RESTful API 接口规范，前端所有页面采用 axios 和 template-web.js 请求和加载数据，原生JavaScript操作页面。

repositories.author: App-vNext
repositories.name: Polly
repositories.description: Polly is a .NET resilience and transient-fault-handling library that allows developers to express policies such as Retry, Circuit Breaker, Timeout, Bulkhead Isolation, and Fallback in a fluent and thread-safe manner. From version 6.0.1, Polly targets .NET Standard 1.1 and 2.0+.
